titleStep.adviceText: Use action verbs. For example: "Ban plastic bags in our city" or "Protect the forest of X". Avoid vague formulations.

objectiveStep.title: Objective
objectiveStep.destinationPlaceholder: To whom do you want to address your petition?
objectiveStep.description: Describe the goal you want to achieve: a law change, a concrete action, a position, etc. Be concise, convincing, and inspire others to join your cause.
objectiveStep.objectivePlaceholder: Why are you launching this petition?
objectiveStep.adviceText: A clear and motivating objective gives meaning to your petition and increases your chances of mobilization.
objectiveStep.aiUsage: You have reached {percentage}% of your planned AI assistance usage

writingStep.title: Writing
writingStep.description: Express your cause clearly, the AI helps you formulate.
writingStep.subDescription: Describe why this petition is important, what are the facts, the consequences, and the solutions you propose.
writingStep.defaultContent:
Express your cause clearly, the AI helps you formulate.
Describe why this petition is important, what are the facts, the consequences, and the solutions you propose.
writingStep.aiAdviceText: If you are not comfortable with writing, use our assistance tool to get a clear, persuasive, and well-structured version.
writingStep.aiUsage: You have reached {percentage}% of your planned AI assistance usage

mediaStep.title: Add an image or video
mediaStep.description: Make your petition more visual and impactful. Add a strong image or a short explanatory video to illustrate your cause.
mediaStep.dragAndDrop: or drag and drop it here
mediaStep.adviceText: Use a free image or personal image. Avoid blurry or generic visuals. High-quality images get more engagement.

signaturesStep.title: Desired number of signatures
signaturesStep.description: Set a realistic but mobilizing goal. Determine the number of signatures you want to reach to give weight to your message.
signaturesStep.adviceText: Start with an accessible goal (ex: 500, 1000), you can increase it if your petition gains popularity.

publishStep.title: Publication scheduling
publishStep.description: Choose when to publish your petition.
publishStep.subDescription: You can publish it immediately or schedule an ideal launch date and time (ex. upcoming event, global day, etc.).
publishStep.adviceText: A good timing can maximize the visibility of your petition. Plan if possible around an event related to your cause.

publishing.title: Ready to publish?
publishing.publishNowText: Your petition will be published immediately and become visible to the public.
publishing.description: Once published, you can share it on social media and start collecting signatures.

notFound.title: Petition Not Found
notFound.description: The petition you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

page.subtitle: Join the change, support the platform.
page.description: Do you believe in the power of petitions to move things? We do too. By donating, you contribute to strengthening an independent platform that gives a voice to everyone. Together, let's make the causes that matter heard. Each donation is an act of commitment.
